original_text: A friend of mine is on a journey and he has arrived at my house. But I have no food to give him.”
korean_text: 내 벗이 여행중에 내게 왔으나 내가 먹일 것이 없노라 하면

sentences.original_text: A friend of mine is on a journey
sentences.korean_translation: 내 친구 한 사람이 여행 중인데

sentences.original_text: and he has arrived at my house
